org.eclipse.smarthome.core.types

Class StateDescriptionFragmentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.types.StateDescriptionFragmentBuilder

  • @NonNullByDefault
public class StateDescriptionFragmentBuilder
extends Object
    Builds a StateDescriptionFragment with the relevant parts only.
    Author:
    Henning Treu - Initial contribution

        public static StateDescriptionFragmentBuilder create(StateDescription legacy)
